mapper.select: select b_idx, b_type, b_title, b_thumbnail , b_url , b_date , b_member , b_company, b_content , ( select COUNT(*) from Board bb where bb.b_type = b.b_type ) as b_cnt, ( select COUNT(*) from Reply r where 1=1 and r.b_idx = b.b_idx and r.b_type =b.b_type ) as br_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) from Good g where 1=1 and g.b_idx = b.b_idx and g.b_type =b.b_type ) as good_cnt from Board b where b_type = #{b_type} order by good_cnt desc;

select b_idx, b_type, b_title, b_thumbnail , b_url , b_date , b_member , b_company, b_content , ( select COUNT(*) from Board ) as b_cnt, ( select COUNT(*) from Reply r where 1=1 and r.b_idx = b.b_idx and r.b_type =b.b_type ) as br_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) from Good g where 1=1 and g.b_idx = b.b_idx and g.b_type =b.b_type ) as good_cnt from Board b where 1=1 and b_member = #{s_name} and b_type = 1 order by b_idx desc
select Count(*) from Board where 1=1 and b_type = 1 and b_url like CONCAT("%", #{vno}, "%") and b_member = #{name}
select Count(*) from Board where 1=1 and b_type = 2 and b_url like CONCAT("%", #{url}, "%") and b_member = #{name}

select b_idx, b_type, b_title, b_thumbnail , b_url , b_date , b_member , b_company, b_content , ( select COUNT(*) from Board ) as b_cnt, ( select COUNT(*) from Reply r where 1=1 and r.b_idx = b.b_idx and r.b_type =b.b_type ) as br_cnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) from Good g where 1=1 and g.b_idx = b.b_idx and g.b_type =b.b_type ) as good_cnt from Board b where b_member = #{s_name} and b_type = 2 order by b_idx desc;

select b_idx, b_type, b_title, b_thumbnail , b_url, b_date , b_company, b_content, ( select COUNT(*) from Reply r where 1=1 and r.b_idx = b.b_idx and r.b_type =b.b_type ) as br_cnt,
( select COUNT(*) from Good g where 1 =1 and g.b_idx =b.b_idx and g.b_type =b.b_type and g.u_email = #{u_email} )as good_flag, ( SELECT COUNT(*) from Good g where 1=1 and g.b_idx = b.b_idx and g.b_type =b.b_type ) as good_cnt from Board b where 1=1 and b_idx = #{b_idx} and b_type = #{b_type};

select r.r_idx, r.r_content, r.u_email as r_email, ui.u_name as r_name, ui.u_profileImg as r_profileImg, r.b_type, r.b_idx, r.r_date from Reply r left outer join UserInfo ui on ui.u_email = r.u_email where r.b_idx = #{b_idx} and r.b_type = #{b_type} order by r.r_idx desc;
mapper.insert: insert into Reply (r_content, u_email, b_type, b_idx) value(#{r_content}, #{r_email}, #{b_type}, #{b_idx});
mapper.delete: delete from Reply where r_idx = #{r_idx} AND b_type = #{b_type} AND b_idx = #{b_idx} AND u_email = #{u_email} ;
mapper.insert: insert into Good(b_type, b_idx, u_email) value(#{b_type}, #{b_idx}, #{u_email});
mapper.select: select bc_idx, s_idx, bc_date, bc_time, bc_title, ( select s_name from Singer s where s.s_idx = b.s_idx )as bc_member from BroadCasting b where s_idx = #{s_idx};
